LIGURIAN SEA.
TYRRHENIAN SEA.
ITALY.
DNC 08.
1. MAN OVERBOARD FROM M/V VALLENTINA IN VICINITY
   OF TRACKLINE JOINING:
   A. 41-26.8N 011-11.3E AT 191800Z OCT.
   B. 41-49.6N 010-33.4E.
   C. 43-19.8N 009-25.5E AT 200707Z OCT.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
   INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 3906 5908 4527,
   3906 5908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737,
   3906 5908 4793, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3371/17.
